H0.text: Which pop legend recently topped the album charts with The Next Day ? His first number one since 1993.. David Bowie

H3.text: Which pop legend recently topped the album charts with The Next Day ? His first number one since 1993.. Bowiean

A4.text: Debuting at number one on the UK Albums Chart, The Next Day was his first album to top the chart since Black Tie White Noise, and was the fastest-selling album of 2013 at the time.
